title: WhatsApp Messenger
description: WhatsApp Messenger is a fast, reliable, and secure messaging app that lets you stay connected with people all around the world. You can send free text messages, make high-quality voice and video calls, and share photos, videos, and documents — all protected with end-to-end encryption. Whether you’re chatting one-on-one or in a group, WhatsApp ensures your conversations stay private and seamless, even on slow connections.

title: Instagram
description: Instagram is your window to creativity, connection, and community. Capture and share your moments through photos, videos, and Stories. Explore trending reels, follow your favorite creators, and discover content tailored to your interests. From personal updates to professional portfolios, Instagram connects you to a global audience and gives you tools to express yourself visually like never before.

title: Spotify
description: Spotify lets you stream millions of songs and podcasts for free. Discover new artists, follow your favorite musicians, and create personalized playlists that match your mood. With offline playback, smart recommendations, and high-quality audio, Spotify delivers an immersive listening experience whether you're relaxing, working out, or traveling. Upgrade to Premium for ad-free music and unlimited skips.

title: Uber
description: Uber is a reliable ride-sharing app that gets you where you need to go, safely and conveniently. Request a ride in seconds, track your driver in real time, and pay seamlessly through the app. Choose from affordable or premium options — Uber adapts to your budget, location, and comfort needs.

title: Netflix
description: Netflix offers unlimited streaming of movies, TV shows, and documentaries from every genre imaginable. Enjoy exclusive Netflix Originals, personalized recommendations, and high-quality video playback. Watch offline, set up multiple profiles, and explore content from every corner of the world — all ad-free and available on any device.

title: Duolingo
description: Learn a new language with fun, bite-sized lessons.

title: Headspace
description: Meditation and sleep made simple with guided sessions.

title: Slack
description: Team communication and collaboration platform.

title: Zoom
description: Zoom makes virtual communication effortless. Host HD video meetings, webinars, and conferences from anywhere. Collaborate with teams using chat, screen sharing, and file sharing. With its simple interface, end-to-end encryption, and reliable performance, Zoom has become the go-to tool for remote work, education, and personal connections.

title: Spotify Kids
description: Music app made just for kids with parental controls.

title: Calm
description: Calm is the #1 app for sleep, meditation, and relaxation — designed to help you reduce stress and improve your mental well-being. With guided meditations, Sleep Stories narrated by soothing voices, relaxing music, and breathing exercises, Calm helps you unwind and focus anytime, anywhere. Discover personalized daily sessions for mindfulness, stress relief, better sleep, and anxiety management. Whether you want to meditate before bed, take a quick mental break, or build a consistent self-care routine, Calm offers science-backed techniques and beautifully crafted soundscapes to help you feel more peaceful, focused, and refreshed every day.

title: TikTok
description: TikTok brings creativity to life through short videos that entertain, inspire, and connect people worldwide. Watch endless personalized content or create your own with trending sounds, effects, and filters. Whether it’s dance, comedy, education, or storytelling, TikTok lets you express your personality and reach global audiences in seconds. Every swipe opens a world of creativity and community.

title: Facebook
description: Facebook is the world’s leading social networking platform where you can share life updates, connect with loved ones, and discover communities that matter to you. Stay informed with trending news, stream live videos, buy or sell items on Marketplace, and interact with millions of users globally. With an easy-to-use interface and multiple engagement options, Facebook keeps your social world active and connected.

title: Twitter
description: X (formerly Twitter) is the go-to platform for real-time updates, opinions, and conversations. Stay informed about global news, trends, and ideas that matter. Follow thought leaders, join discussions, and express yourself in short posts, photos, or live videos. Whether you’re sharing insights or discovering what’s happening, X keeps you connected to the pulse of the world.

title: Pinterest
description: Pinterest is your inspiration board for everything creative. Discover thousands of ideas — from recipes and fashion to home décor and fitness. Save pins, organize boards, and plan your next project visually. Whether you’re exploring hobbies or planning your dream home, Pinterest helps bring imagination to life.

title: LinkedIn
description: LinkedIn is the world’s largest professional networking platform where you can grow your career and make meaningful connections. Build your professional profile, showcase achievements, and discover new job opportunities. Follow companies, learn new skills, and engage in conversations with industry experts — all designed to help you advance your professional journey.

title: Snapchat
description: Snapchat is a fun and spontaneous way to connect with friends. Capture and share photos or videos that disappear after viewing. Use filters, AR lenses, and Bitmoji to make every snap creative and unique. With Stories, Spotlight, and chat features, Snapchat helps you stay close to friends and explore trending content from around the world — in real time.

title: YouTube
description: YouTube is the world’s largest video-sharing platform where billions of people come to watch, learn, and share. Enjoy tutorials, music, news, vlogs, and more from creators around the globe. Subscribe to channels, explore trending topics, and personalize your feed to your interests. With offline viewing and YouTube Premium, enjoy an ad-free experience and background play wherever you go.

title: Gmail
description: Gmail is a smart and secure email service by Google. Organize your inbox with advanced filters, spam protection, and AI-powered search. Sync effortlessly across devices, attach large files via Drive, and stay productive with built-in Meet and Chat integrations. Gmail keeps communication efficient and clutter-free.

title: Google Maps
description: Google Maps is your reliable guide to exploring the world. Get accurate navigation, live traffic updates, public transit info, and local recommendations. From finding restaurants to discovering hidden spots, Google Maps ensures smooth journeys whether you’re driving, walking, or cycling — even offline.

title: Discord
description: Discord is the ultimate communication platform for communities, gamers, creators, and friends to connect through voice, video, and text. Create your own servers or join existing ones to chat in real time, share media, stream live gameplay, and collaborate effortlessly. With organized channels, powerful moderation tools, and crystal-clear voice calls, Discord is designed for both casual conversations and large communities. Whether you’re planning a project, studying with friends, or hosting gaming sessions, Discord keeps everyone connected in one place. Stay in touch anytime with mobile and desktop syncing, custom emojis, bots, and endless customization options — all for free.

title: Pubg
description: Ultimate Battle Royale On Mobile.

title: Airbnb
description: Airbnb makes it easy to find unique places to stay and unforgettable travel experiences anywhere in the world. Whether you’re looking for a cozy cabin, a beachfront villa, a city apartment, or a countryside retreat, Airbnb connects you directly with local hosts offering authentic stays. Discover millions of listings across 220+ countries, complete with verified photos, guest reviews, and flexible booking options. You can also host travelers and earn money by sharing your space. With powerful search filters, trip planning tools, and secure payment protection, Airbnb turns every trip into a personalized adventure — from weekend getaways to long-term stays.

title: Trello
description: Trello is a powerful project management and task organization app designed to help teams and individuals plan, track, and collaborate effortlessly. Using its signature card-and-board system, you can organize projects, manage to-do lists, assign tasks, set due dates, and track progress visually. Whether you’re managing work projects, planning personal goals, or coordinating team efforts, Trello makes everything simple and transparent. Integrate it with tools like Google Drive, Slack, and Jira to streamline your workflow. With real-time syncing across devices, customizable boards, and automation through Butler, Trello turns chaos into clarity — helping you stay productive anywhere.

title: Dropbox
description: Dropbox keeps your files safe, synced, and accessible anywhere. Upload documents, photos, and videos, and access them instantly from any device. Collaborate easily with shared folders and automatic backups. With smart sync and version history, Dropbox simplifies secure storage and team collaboration.
